## Please download and install the following softwares

* Download and install the GapMinder offline: https://www.gapminder.org/tools-offline

* Register for Exploratory and download/install Exploratory: https://exploratory.io/download

* Download and install R: https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CRAN

* Download and install RStudio: https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/

* Download and install QGIS: https://qgis.org/


## Requirement

 + Take a snapshot of the installed programs
 + Insert the snapshots of the five programs into a word document
